name: Space Alert (itch)
description:
ALERT! Enemy ships incoming! Defend the Mothership!

Protect the Mothership by destroying the enemy ships, Godspeed Cadet

Use your cursor to Aim

Use the left click to Shoot

Use WASD or Arrow Keys to maneuver your Ship

Get fallen Fuel Canisters to keep fighting

We lose once you run out of Fuel, defend and refuel Cadet!

I hope you Enjoy the Game!
